title: Create Cache Schema
description: Schema for creating a cache entry

name.description: The name of the cache entry

githubUsername.description: The GitHub username associated with the cache entry

public.description: Indicates whether the cache entry is public or private

compression.description: The preferred compression method for the cache entry

priority.description: The priority level of a cache

enableBuilder.description: Indicates whether the builder is enabled for this cache entry

publicSigningKey.description: The public signing key for the cache entry
